thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Public Garden

title: Public Garden
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
The Public Garden of Curitiba (Passeio Público) is the oldest park in Curitiba and is located in the city center. The park covers an area of 69,285 m² and is considered one of the most important symbols of Curitiba, with a large green area in the middle of an urban area having species of Paraná fauna and flora. O park consists of several lakes and islets. In the past the park housed the Zoo and the Botanical garden of Curitiba. Now both have their own space.
